sn32.55:1.2: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
sn32.55:1.3: “ko nu kho, bhante, hetu, ko paccayo, yenekadā abbhaṁ hotī”ti?
sn32.55:1.6: ‘yannūna mayaṁ sakāya ratiyā vaseyyāmā’ti, tesaṁ taṁ cetopaṇidhimanvāya abbhaṁ hoti.
sn32.55:1.7: Ayaṁ kho, bhikkhu, hetu, ayaṁ paccayo, yenekadā abbhaṁ hotī”ti.
